reviews.review:
Für mich das beste Spiel 2013. Die Story hat mich einfach nur umgehauen, vorallem wenn am Ende alles irgendwie ein Sinn ergibt. Für jeden empfehlenswert der Egoshooter mag bei denen die Story klar im Vordergrund steht.

Still great. Play it!

Considering I didn't like Bioshock 1 at all, this game is great. Plot is surreal but advanced nicely by means of exposition but never seems to slow anything down.

Elizabeth is possibly the best companion in a game I've ever seen, the mechanics of how she works in combat are brilliant, and the interactions with her just don't get old (having played to completion now).
Better than the original Bioshock. Must buy!! ^(*-*)^

This is a great game for two main reasons, art direction and story content. The story is decent but the mythology is better. The art direction and level design are outstanding, every turn there is a new awe-inspiring view. It is a decent shooter, there's nothing particularly innovative other than the rail system you can fight along, which is pretty fun, the game mechanics are fairly recycled from past shooter tropes. Play it for the atmosphere and discovery, not the mechanics.

Pros:
Stunning visuals
intensely interesting characters,
detailed plot with incredible depth, twists and turns.
weapons and abilities feel solid and effective

Cons: 
Every once in a while I got nauseous playing this game.
Some of the combos are beyond my comprehension

I go back to this game pretty often, but mostly I'd really love to just watch a movie of it. :P
Look at it this way... It took three different girls (One for her body, one for her face, and another for her voice) to make Elizabeth. Thats like six boobs. GET IT.
Gameplay is alright, but the story. Oh my...

This game is amazing, and I'm not even finished. The story is top notch, and the characters engage with you. The music sets the scene, and the visuals have a stunning design. This game is worth any money you'll spend, because in almost every way it is a perfect, masterly crafted game.
Outstanding.

This is the greatest achievement in videogame storytelling since bioshock 1. The character development, plot and environments are all excellent. It's even a decent FPS to boot.

Get it. Get it now.
Тщательно проработанная и прекрасно срежиссированная игра.

My personal GOTY.
A very atmosphereic game with core ideas, and ways to screw with your head.
You actually want to find everything there. Everything has it's meaning.
Everything.
Одна из лучших игр, что я играл. Потрясающая графика и интересный сюжет. Претендент на игру года. Must have однозначно!

Good:
- Storyline is beyond anything you could imagine
- There is still a lot of things to do in Columbia even after you complete the game
- Characters are excellent. When writers intended you to hate any particular character - you WILL hate him
- Dynamic battles. In Easy mode you will oneshot even the Handymen, whether on Hard even a regular police officer can handle you

Bad:
- Game mechanics is easily exploitable. Even on 1999 you can keep enemies in their spawn area sectors, from where they can't follow you to the nearby sector, making even the SPOILER banshee fight in Bank look like Easy mode

TL;DR Other than easily exploitable AI the game is excellent, worth playing by anyone whether you are a storyline lover or a shooter maniac.
9/10
I'm crying
love this game. it has a great story and you eventually get attacted to the characters. the graphics are outstanding and the gameplay more so. this game is a must play for all gamers.
Great story if you like Bioshock. Fantastic combat system, very balenced gameplay. Highly recommend you pick this one up.
Great game until the ending which shits all over itself.
One of the best games I have played in a long time... mind blowingly good :D <3
10/10 in 9 of 10 existing realities.

Like The Walking Dead, this game is saved by its story, mainly because it not only tickles my brain with weird shit, I actually found the story to be quite compelling the more it goes on. I was quite disappointed with the actual mechanics of the game, as they've not only been streamlined even more than the original Bioshock (and that streamlining being the main reason as to why I just like the original Bioshock instead of preaching gospel about it). Supposedly 1999 Mode fixes my complaints about mechanics with the game, but after seeing how it all transpired, I am pretty much okay with Infinite. I might even go so far as to call it good!

I've played games for some time now and I have found very few examples of a game where I can truly feel as though they are a form of art. This game is one of those examples. The story alone is a hands down master piece that most novels can't even compare themselves too. The gameplay is fast paced and fluid with plenty of options to both learn and master. Bioshock Infinite is one of the finest examples of what a game is and should be and I hope to see more like it in the future.

The best game Levine has made to date. Absolutely beautiful environments, great characters, great voice acting, solid and responsive shooting and superb writing. If you like shooters or games with a great narrative you have to play this!
Достойная игра с интересным геймплеем. Качественный теплый ламповый стимпанковый сеттинг. Удобное управление, интересный сюжет, приятные персонажи.
REally good story, too bad it is told in a FPS format, what takes a bit from immersion and coherence.
Certainly lives up to the hype. Great story combined with solid gameplay.

I've only played about an hour of this game and it already seems amazing.

The sheer colours make it looks soooooo pretty :)
Possibly the best story in an FPS -- or any game, for that matter.

Great game, good story, nice twist, and most importantly she couldn't just leave me in rapture?

Performance wise:
I was only able to manage in medium graphics, until the end where it's just clusterfuck and had to turn it down to low. Overall you shouldn't see a contrast between the settings. Unlike Bioshock 2, this game has far less crashes. 

Number of crashes:0
I felt like Luke Skywalker upon completion of this game. Not because I was the hero, but because I totally wanted to bang this girl before I found out we were related.

WOW! What can I say that would legitmize this game anymore than actually playing it?...Not many games can bring depth to so many qualities in a video game. The fine tune FPS gameplay mechanics, RPG-style character development, and most astounding, the philisophical depth of the story. Truly a game worth every cent, every second, and every bit of your attention. Intense, riveting, exciting, comical, scary, creepy, beautiful, delightful, and the list goes on. Please, just do me a favor and purchase this game. It doesn't really matter tho, because "Lives, lived, will live. Dies, died, will die."
One of the best games ever! The ending will be stuck in your head for days.

Definitely a refreshing game. Story is fantastic and thought provoking,  Vigors provide a reasonable variation in gameplay along with the skyline elevation changes. The best bit however has to be the way the choices provide a minor difference to events, but do not change the ending overall, so you easily choose one without worrying about getting the 'bad' ending.
The game is great. Without spoiling anything, the story warrants many playthroughs. Just don't go into it thinking it is exactly like Bioshock and appreciate it for what it is.
One of the best games I have ever played.  Fantastic story, beautiful environments, and an overall excellent experience.
Muito bom

"Died, die, will die". Einstein acreditava na ausência de tempo, para ele, tudo, o passado, presente e futuro aconteciam simultâneamente. Bioshock brinca com esse conceito e de forma brilhante faz o jogador de fato pensar. Além da questão metafísica, ele traz temas polêmicos à tona igual aos seus antecessores: ética, moral, escravidão, alienação, dentre outras. O jogo é tão envolvente que faz o jogador se sentir dentro da trama e um elemente chave para isso é a semi-realista Elizabeth, personagem que lhe vai acompanhar pela história. Gameplay fluido e bem construido, com apenas um defeito aqui e ali, como a repetitividade, o que não apaga de forma alguma o brilho estonteante do jogo. Recomendo fortemente este jogo e uma palavra-chave que o resume é: perfeito.
YES

Первые 3 часа проходил через силу. Чрезвычайное уныние. Ни шутера, ни сюжета. Держался через силу. Даже час после того как встретил Элизабет - был адски уныл. Где-то на 4 часу начали давать вполне нормальных врагов в хорошем количестве.

Пожалуй к шестому часу сюжет начал подавать надежды на какое-то нормальное развитие, уже стало интересно играть. Врагов кидали пачками. К слову, проходил на максимальной сложности, но проблем всё равно не было. Будто играл на изике.
Ну а где-то 7 часу всё настолько закрутилось, завертелось, что хрен оторвёшься... Когда пошли титры на экране, было странное ощущение пустоты. Такое у меня бывает, когда игра цепляет.

Очень интересный сюжет, который держит до конца. К тому же игра вполне вменяемый шутан. Дизайн оружия кстати не вштырил. Всё печальное в основном. Но мир очень круто сделан. Хотя дальные планы плывут в мыле.

Есть лёгкое впечатление того, что игру делали в торопях(что вполне закономерно для ААА проекта). Очень часто встречаются моменты - стыки в мапе, дыры между стыкуемыми домами, сквозь которые видно всё и прочие не очень хорошие мелочи.

Но в целом игра вышла очень достойной. Я бы даже сказал - произведением искусства. Очень добротная история, в которой из-за невнимательности можно ещё и не разобраться с сюжетом после прохождения. Эта игра входит в список тех игр, которые никого не оставит равнодушным. Ну и к прохождению разумеется - обязательна.

Mind fuckingly brilliant, awesome game maybe although the scenary has changed   in this game compared to the previous games it still manages to keep what made the bioshock series unique to other FPS titles. 9.5/10
juegazooo muy recomendado
Wow. One of the most beautiful stories in gaming.

Esse concerteza pra mim é um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, concerteza o melhor jogo de tiro,uma história surpreendente em um mundo fantástico. Esse é o jogo que eu recomendo a todos jogarem não só ele como todos os bioshocks.
Aivan loistava! Jo aiemmat Shockit koukutti, mutta tämä jyrää...

前作同様ストーリーが良かった。世界観や風景なども美しい。
難易度も何時でも変更でき、縛りプレイの方法もあるのでやりごたえはそれぞれ最適なレベルに調整可能。
エリザベスがカワイイ。ピンチには助けてくれるし、差し入れされる度に心強い。彼女とはなれる間はとてもさびしくて辛かった。
graphics=awesome, gameplay is amazing i was very impressed. I usually don't like singleplayer games but i never got bored. This game is defiently worth the money

I was not happy with this game originally, because it removed the key aspects of a true bioshock game. in this game eve has been replaced with salts, plasmids have been replaced with vigors, also its not under the seaaaaaa. But as you keep playing the game getts better due to the story line, I would reccomend this game but since they key aspects have been removed or replaced, this game only gets 4 out of 5

バイオショックシリーズの最新作ではあるけれど、過去作を知らなくても楽しめる内容となっております。
　プレイしていて思ったのは、戦闘があまり楽しくないということです。銃は種類が多い上に、全種類使用する弾が別。なのに、同時に持てる銃は二つまで。弾が切れたら、敵が落とした銃を拾い、その弾も切れたら別の銃へという繰り返し。
　シリーズの特色である特殊能力も、敵の動きを止める用途のものが三種類ほどあり、ほとんど違いを感じられなかったです。
　今まで行えた回復アイテムを常備しておき、ピンチになったら使えるというシステムも廃されており、プレイ中は常に物資が不足し、貧乏な気持ちになりながら空中都市をさまよう羽目になります。
　舞台となる空中都市は、最初こそ満点の青空なのですが、序盤から雲の中に迷い込んだり、巨大な都市の建物内をさまよったりするため、いまいち空中を旅しているという気持ちは味わえませんでした。
　ただ、上記の不満点を全て解消するのが、ヒロイン兼相棒役であるエリザベスの存在です。
　「パリに行きたい」という漠然とした願望で、主人公の誘いに乗り、幽閉されていた場所から脱走した彼女。彼女を連れ戻そうとする敵から、主人公と二人きりで逃走劇を繰り広げます。
　彼女の存在がとにかく魅力的。目的地まで常に、主人公の前を走り、主人公が止まると立ち止まり、寄り道をすると心配そうに後ろから見つめてきます。退屈なエレベータ内では、とりとめもない話をしてくれますし（前作までの無口な主人公から、饒舌なキャラクターに変更になったのは、この点においては大成功といえるでしょう）、アイテムを回収しているときは、一緒に机の下やごみの山をのぞき込んだりしてくれます。
　彼女の存在が最も際立つのが、戦闘中でしょう。上にも書いた通り、このゲームは常に物資が足りないです。敵は大量に現れ、銃弾が雨のように降ってきます。体力は減り、精神は疲弊し、弾薬は尽きてきます。しかし、そんなときに聞こえてくるのが、エリザベスの「ブッカー、受け取って！」です。彼女の声に合わせボタンを押すと、彼女が、まさに今自分が欲しかったものを投げてくれるのです。これにより、彼女と一緒に戦っているのだという気持ちを得る上に、不満点であった物資の不足が一気に物語上の利点となるのです。
　百点満点で表すなら、システムだけだと五十点（ギリギリ不可）ですが、エリザベスの存在だけで八十点を付けたいと思います。
Великолепная игра! Такие произведения искусства создаются лишь раз, но навсегда остаются в сердцах людей!
Как шутер  - говно полное. А вот квест мог бы получиться потряясающим. Концовка мозговыносящая.
El mejor juego que he jugado desde hace muchisimo. Escpetacular es poco. BRUTAL.
Takes the uncanny feel of the original bioshock, freshens it up with a touch of setting change and uses it to tell another fantastic (in the literal sense) story. A must play.

Engaging and intelligent story with well-crafted characters - atmosphere and world-building is absolutely masterful. Gameplay is nothing revolutionary, especially if you've played one of the previous BioShock games, but the different powers and their combinations allow for some creative threat removal techniques.

Recommended if you: like antiheroes, enjoy kicking people from flying cities, appreciate well-written characters

Not recommended if you: don't like FPS, are allergic to games that make you think (at least on occasion)

Well, some reviews say this game is like, a masterpiece or something... I don't think it is. Don't get me wrong, this is a good game, and it really gets fun and interesting once you meet Elizabeth and get the grapple thingy. But some parts feel a bit too linear, and the story is a bit too abstract for me. The intro is also way too long and boring. But I'm nit-picking here, I mean it really is a worthwhile experience and I recommend it, but I think it gets praised a little too much. I'd give it a 7.5 out of 10.

Good game with charismatic characters and awesome storyline. The game is very pretty and the level design is beautiful. Its a joy to walk or run among all the crazy people of Columbia and admire the city's buildings and streets. The gameplay is good but its not original and it felt a bit repetitive sometimes. There is no different angle of approach so every fight is somehow the same.  If you want to play Bioshock Infinite, you'll play it for the story, not for the gameplay. 

Note that I haven't played Bioshock 1 or 2 before playing Infinite. 
Imho, worth a 86/100.

This game.. 

ROCKS!
AMAZING game! If you have not played it already, buy it now and play it. Well worth it!
I just completed the story for the first time, no spoliers....  I still am speachless, if you have some free time and a few extra bucks I guarantee you will not be disapointed.
This game has one of the best stories I've seen in a game in years. The only other game that I can think of who's story is just as good would be The Last of Us.
insane but awesome

One of the best, if not best games I have ever played, amazing story, amazing art design, amazing combat and amazing game play mechanics. If you are a fan of bio shock, or even someone who is new the the series, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND playing this game, and if its on sale, THERE IS NO REASON NOT TO BUY IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Murder of Crows is best angry bird.

WHAT! SEEN CRAZY Sky city! Do not try fall! LOL

Best game BioShock Infinite Action Shooter Solo Players 2013! And 5 of 5 Stars!
Just get it, words cannot describe the awesomeness of this game.

This game is freakin' awesome.  It was like playing through an episode of Lost, but with guns.  And super-powers.  And a flying city.  And that's just the FIRST half.  The alternate realities and time travelling both come later.  This is an incredibly rich story told in video game form.  Best game so far this year.

The only thing I would change about this game is I wish I was able to join "The Gayest Quartet in All of Columbia!"  But no no no!  Can't do that, can we?  NOPE just shooting fire and water out of your hands at big ass George Washingtons with Mini Guns and shit...

...I guess thats fun too.

A story-driven FPS that takes time in 1912. It shows the main storyline entwined with various elements, like the Vox Populi revolution and the Lutece twins, making the story addictive, not to mention the mind-blowing finale. 
If not better than BioShock 1, its side by side with it.
Booker....CATCH!

This game made love to my heart and brain and didn't call back the night after.

11/10
Best of the year!
Good.
you will question your sanity after you get to the very end
Probably, the most intense feelings from the game ever. You will remember this game. I promise :3

Definitiv das Spiel des Jahres. ........ mag sein das ich es in 10 Std. "schoN" durch hatte, aber was man hier auf Story und Atmosphäre geboten kriegt ...... ist einfach der wahnsinn :-)

Gab selten ein Spiel das ich so gern (am STÜCK) durch gespielt hab :)

und der dritte (eigentlich interessanteste) wurde sehr lieblos "dahin" gehaun. Die Story an sich (ohne zuviel zu verraten) ist in diesem zweiteiligen Part wieder in Rapture angesiedelt. Ich habe das Spiel soeben ein 2. Mal durchgespielt und bin auch jetzt wieder einfach nur begeistert! Ich wage zu behaupten, dass Bioshock Infinite zum aktuellen Zeitpunkt das Spiel ist, welches mir am meisten Spaß bereitet hat - und ich bin mehr als nur ein Gelegenheits-Zocker.

Die Idee der fliegenden Stadt, die ganze (komplexe) Story (welche ich auch zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt noch immer nicht ganz verstehe), Elizabeth - wie sie einem ans Herz wächst, ... Mir fehlen ganz einfach die Worte

Bitte deutet das Fehlen der Worte als ehrfürchtige Verbeugung vor den Entwicklern des Spiels - denn sie haben es mehr als verdient.

Games like Bioshock Infinite only come around once every 10 or 15 years, most recent of which, in my opinion, being Ocarina of Time, and the whole of gaming industry is still at the mercy of the ripple it created. This bodes well for the impact Bioshock 3 will have on the gaming universe. Bioshock Infinite is relevent, it's subtle, it's beautiful. It seems hell bent on proving once and for all that games are indeed great works of art, and that the stories told therein can be so grand and exciting in nature that we cannot simply hear them, we must live them. 

I appreciate Infinite not only for being one of the most enjoyable experiences I've had gaming in a very long time, but for renewing my faith in an industry seeming to focus more and more on making a quick buck, selling the same thing time after time knowing it'll sell. Bioshock Infinite shines above the filth that are most of today's regergitated first person shooters, a genre I had almost lost faith in.
Its so awesome with bookker dewitt that needs to get a girl and in a flying city O: highly recommended, BUT it has good graphic so set it on low or medium if you dont have a new pc  c:
An absolute masterpiece.

I have played both BioShocks on Xbox360 and I loved them. And when I heard about Infinite, needless to say, I practically sang joyful showtunes in wonder. When I saw that it came out I picked it up straight away. This game has one of the best storylines Ive played in my entire history of video games. The twists and turns always keep you on the edge of your seat and because of this you'll never have a dull moment here. The weapons and gunplay are smooth and allow for someone to adapt quickly. The variety of weapons was so fantastic and the upgrades were so fun that I was extremley dissapointed when I finished the game that I didn't get to upgrade and try everything. The bosses were interesting and challenging, and even the mini-bosses made me groan up until the end. BioShock Infinite is one of the most beautifully crafted games Ive had the honor of playing in a long time. If your itching to play the game, don't wait for a sale. And if you already bought it and it goes on sale? Gift it to a friend! This game is an excellentn addition to anyones Steam library. 10/10 Fantastic game, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
deepest scenario i have played by far. a must buy!
Awesome game, great story, amazing graphics.  Get it!
Very shooty but very pretty! <3~
is good
This game rocks. Just the soundtrack alone makes it worth playing!!
Ok, so if you're looking for a singleplayer game to keep you occupied, this is it. This is a MUST for every FPS fan. The controls may take a while to get used to, but it is worth it.

Наконец-то игра заставляет вконце задуматься и сложить все датальки пазла воедино , которые ты аккуратно собираешь во время прохождения . Love this game.

it has everything! 

This game might be an alltime favorite of mine.
Storytelling re-imagined.

If you were anywhere on the internet at the time of the game's release, it would have been difficult to not get an opinion on the game in some form or another. Less exploring available than the original Bioshock, the story is still fairly linear. However, the world that's created is rich in detail and personality. The conversations you'll overhear throughout your time in the game will make you laugh, smile, or even recoil in offense. 

If a game is meant to tell a story, Bioshock: Infinite certainly does that. It's immersive enough to enjoy, despite it's few flaws.

el cierre perfecto (contando Burial at Sea) a una de mis sagas favoritas.












Elizabeth uwu
